segments.text: What ! That wasn't a foul ! C ’ mon , ref !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry , Shan always screws up free throws .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You were right ! He didn ’ t make the shot !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That was a great shot ! A three pointer , yeah !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you see that ? He traveled and the ref didn ’ t call it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This ref needs glasses . Hey ref , open your eyes ! I can ’ t believe he didn ’ t see that !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay ... end of the first quarter ... Alright , I ’ m gonna make a beer run .
segments.speaker: S1
